duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and expand the business with one of the company’s largest and most marquee Telecom client.
Define the Annual Account Plan and prepare ongoing updates to ensure relevance to customer stakeholders.
Orchestrate internal resources to drive outcomes as per the Account Plan and defined KPIs.
Lead proposal development and negotiation of commercial terms.
Develop trusted advisor relationships with key decision makers & influencers in the client organization.
Build relationships with procurement and ensure streamlined financial processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
